Essentials.​Workflows.​notify_then_do

Notifying through chat and then start doing something.

Parameters
.wfdata.notify

the list of channel, "reply" means where this is triggered

.wfdata.work

what to do

.wfdata.message

content to be send to chat

.wfdata.chat_system

which chat system to use, default to slack system

Examples
---
rules:
  - when:
      ...
    do:
      content: notify_then_do
      data:
        notify:
          - "#my_channel"
          - "@user_name"
          - reply              # only works if triggered through slash command
        message:
          attachments:
            - color: good
              text: I am doing something ...
        work:
          ...
